name: BBTronics.com
overview:
BBTronics.com allows anyone to sell their pre-owned electronics without the hassles of traditional selling methods.

Visitors can browse through multiple categories of popular consumer gadgets or easily find their item using the site’s search function. After a couple questions about the item’s condition, an instant quote is given, at which point the user can complete the sale in a few easy steps.

BBTronics.com recognizes the future of consumer demand in technology and the convenience of hassle-free upgrading. We want to pave the way for smart re-commerce by supplying the second-hand market with affordable products, while properly disposing of the items that have reached their end-of-life.
